net.nutch.db
Class Link

java.lang.Object
  net.nutch.db.Link
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable, Writable, WritableComparable
public class Link
extends Object
implements WritableComparable

This is the field in the Link Database. Each row is a Link: type name description --------------------------------------------------------------- byte VERSION - A byte indicating the version of this entry. 128bit FROM_ID - The MD5 hash of the source of the link. 64bit DOMAIN_ID - The 8-byte MD5Hash of the source's domain. string TO_URL - The URL destination of the link. string ANCHOR - The anchor text of the link. boolean TARGET_HAS_OUTLINK - Whether the target of the link has outlinks.

Author:
Mike Cafarella
